verses.verse: וּמָרְדֳּכַ֗י <S%H4782><s%> When Mordecai יָדַע֙ <S%H3045><s%> perceived אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that נַעֲשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> all that was done וַיִּקְרַ֤ע <S%H7167><s%> rent מָרְדֳּכַי֙ <S%H4782><s%> Mordecai אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּגָדָ֔יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וַיִּלְבַּ֥שׁ <S%H3847><s%> and put on שַׂ֖ק <S%H8242><s%> sackcloth וָאֵ֑פֶר <S%H665><s%> with ashes וַיֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> and went out בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> into the midst הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וַיִּזְעַ֛ק <S%H2199><s%> and cried זְעָקָ֥ה <S%H2201><s%> cry גְדֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> with a loud וּמָרָֽה׃ <S%H4751><s%> and a bitter

וַיָּב֕וֹא <S%H935><s%> And came עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> far לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> even before שַֽׁעַר־ <S%H8179><s%> gate הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no לָב֛וֹא <S%H935><s%> for none [might] enter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about שַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> into the king's בִּלְב֥וּשׁ <S%H3830><s%> clothed שָֽׂק׃ <S%H8242><s%> with sackcloth

וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every מְדִינָ֣ה <S%H4082><s%> And in every province וּמְדִינָ֗ה <S%H4082><s%> province מְקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> whithersoever אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> commandment הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's וְדָתוֹ֙ <S%H1881><s%> and his decree מַגִּ֔יעַ <S%H5060><s%> came אֵ֤בֶל <S%H60><s%> mourning גָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> [there was] great לַיְּהוּדִ֔ים <S%H3064><s%> among the Jews וְצ֥וֹם <S%H6685><s%> and fasting וּבְכִ֖י <S%H1065><s%> and weeping וּמִסְפֵּ֑ד <S%H4553><s%> and wailing שַׂ֣ק <S%H8242><s%> in sackcloth וָאֵ֔פֶר <S%H665><s%> and ashes יֻצַּ֖ע <S%H3331><s%> lay לָֽרַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> and many

[וַתְּבֹואֶינָה כ] (וַ֠תָּבֹואנָה <S%H935><s%> abide ק) נַעֲר֨וֹת <S%H5291><s%> maids אֶסְתֵּ֤ר <S%H635><s%> So Esther's וְסָרִיסֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5631><s%> and her chamberlains וַיַּגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> and told לָ֔הּ וַתִּתְחַלְחַ֥ל <S%H2342><s%> grieved הַמַּלְכָּ֖ה <S%H4436><s%> [it] her Then was the queen מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> exceedingly וַתִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> and she sent בְּגָדִ֜ים <S%H899><s%> raiment לְהַלְבִּ֣ישׁ <S%H3847><s%> to clothe אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מָרְדֳּכַ֗י <S%H4782><s%> Mordecai וּלְהָסִ֥יר <S%H5493><s%> and to take away שַׂקּ֛וֹ <S%H8242><s%> his sackcloth מֵעָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not קִבֵּֽל׃ <S%H6901><s%> from him but he received

וַתִּקְרָא֩ <S%H7121><s%> Then called אֶסְתֵּ֨ר <S%H635><s%> Esther לַהֲתָ֜ךְ <S%H2047><s%> for Hatach מִסָּרִיסֵ֤י <S%H5631><s%> chamberlains הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> [one] of the king's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֶעֱמִ֣יד <S%H5975><s%> whom he had appointed לְפָנֶ֔יהָ <S%H6440><s%> to attend וַתְּצַוֵּ֖הוּ <S%H6680><s%> upon her and gave him a commandment עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מָרְדֳּכָ֑י <S%H4782><s%> to Mordecai לָדַ֥עַת <S%H3045><s%> to know מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what זֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> and why זֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> went forth הֲתָ֖ךְ <S%H2047><s%> So Hatach אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to מָרְדֳּכָ֑י <S%H4782><s%> to Mordecai אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about רְח֣וֹב <S%H7339><s%> unto the street הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> which [was] before שַֽׁעַר־ <S%H8179><s%> gate הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king's

וַיַּגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> told ל֣וֹ מָרְדֳּכַ֔י <S%H4782><s%> And Mordecai אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that קָרָ֑הוּ <S%H7136><s%> him of all that had happened וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> פָּרָשַׁ֣ת <S%H6575><s%> unto him and of the sum הַכֶּ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of the money אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> had promised הָמָן֙ <S%H2001><s%> that Haman לִ֠שְׁקוֹל <S%H8254><s%> to pay עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and גִּנְזֵ֥י <S%H1595><s%> treasuries הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king's [בַּיְּהוּדִיִּים כ] (בַּיְּהוּדִ֖ים <S%H3064><s%> Jew ק) לְאַבְּדָֽם׃ <S%H6><s%> to destroy

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פַּתְשֶׁ֣גֶן <S%H6572><s%> him the copy כְּתָֽב־ <S%H3791><s%> of the writing הַ֠דָּת <S%H1881><s%> of the decree אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִתַּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> Also he gave בְּשׁוּשָׁ֤ן <S%H7800><s%> at Shushan לְהַשְׁמִידָם֙ <S%H8045><s%> to destroy נָ֣תַן <S%H5414><s%> that was given ל֔וֹ לְהַרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> them to shew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶסְתֵּ֖ר <S%H635><s%> [it] unto Esther וּלְהַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> and to declare לָ֑הּ וּלְצַוּ֣וֹת <S%H6680><s%> [it] unto her and to charge עָלֶ֗יהָ <S%H5921><s%> her to לָב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> her that she should go in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king לְהִֽתְחַנֶּן־ <S%H2603><s%> to make supplication ל֛וֹ וּלְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> unto him and to make request מִלְּפָנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> before עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with עַמָּֽהּ׃ <S%H5971><s%> him for her people

וַיָּב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> came הֲתָ֑ךְ <S%H2047><s%> And Hatach וַיַּגֵּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> and told לְאֶסְתֵּ֔ר <S%H635><s%> Esther אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> the words מָרְדֳּכָֽי׃ <S%H4782><s%> of Mordecai

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake אֶסְתֵּר֙ <S%H635><s%> Again Esther לַהֲתָ֔ךְ <S%H2047><s%> unto Hatach וַתְּצַוֵּ֖הוּ <S%H6680><s%> and gave him commandment אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to מָרְדֳּכָֽי׃ <S%H4782><s%> unto Mordecai

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> servants הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> All the king's וְעַם־ <S%H5971><s%> and the people מְדִינ֨וֹת <S%H4082><s%> provinces הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's יֽוֹדְעִ֗ים <S%H3045><s%> do know אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that whosoever whether man וְאִשָּׁ֡ה <S%H802><s%> or woman אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who יָבֽוֹא־ <S%H935><s%> shall come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּלֶךְ֩ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הֶחָצֵ֨ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַפְּנִימִ֜ית <S%H6442><s%> into the inner אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not יִקָּרֵ֗א <S%H7121><s%> who is not called אַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> [there is] one דָּתוֹ֙ <S%H1881><s%> law לְהָמִ֔ית <S%H4191><s%> of his to put [him] to death לְ֠בַד <S%H905><s%> except מֵאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who יֽוֹשִׁיט־ <S%H3447><s%> shall hold out ל֥וֹ הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> such to whom the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁרְבִ֥יט <S%H8275><s%> sceptre הַזָּהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> the golden וְחָיָ֑ה <S%H2421><s%> that he may live וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> have not נִקְרֵ֙אתִי֙ <S%H7121><s%> but I have not been called לָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> to come in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> these שְׁלוֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> these thirty יֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> days
וַיַּגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> And they told לְמָרְדֳּכָ֔י <S%H4782><s%> to Mordecai אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> words אֶסְתֵּֽר׃ <S%H635><s%> Esther's פ

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> commanded מָרְדֳּכַ֖י <S%H4782><s%> Then Mordecai לְהָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> to answer אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶסְתֵּ֑ר <S%H635><s%> Esther אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּדַמִּ֣י <S%H1819><s%> Think בְנַפְשֵׁ֔ךְ <S%H5315><s%> not with thyself לְהִמָּלֵ֥ט <S%H4422><s%> that thou shalt escape בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> in the king's מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיְּהוּדִֽים׃ <S%H3064><s%> more than all the Jews

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if הַחֲרֵ֣שׁ <S%H2790><s%> For if thou altogether תַּחֲרִישִׁי֮ <S%H2790><s%> holdest thy peace בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> at this time הַזֹּאת֒ <S%H2063><s%> likewise רֶ֣וַח <S%H7305><s%> [then] shall there enlargement וְהַצָּלָ֞ה <S%H2020><s%> and deliverance יַעֲמ֤וֹד <S%H5975><s%> arise לַיְּהוּדִים֙ <S%H3064><s%> to the Jews מִמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place אַחֵ֔ר <S%H312><s%> from another וְאַ֥תְּ <S%H859><s%> you וּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֖יךְ <S%H1><s%> but thou and thy father's תֹּאבֵ֑דוּ <S%H6><s%> shall be destroyed וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> and who יוֹדֵ֔עַ <S%H3045><s%> and who knoweth אִם־ <S%H518><s%> whether לְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> for [such] a time כָּזֹ֔את <S%H2063><s%> have not הִגַּ֖עַתְּ <S%H5060><s%> whether thou art come לַמַּלְכֽוּת׃ <S%H4438><s%> to the kingdom
וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> bade אֶסְתֵּ֖ר <S%H635><s%> Then Esther לְהָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> [them] return אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to מָרְדֳּכָֽי׃ <S%H4782><s%> Mordecai

לֵךְ֩ <S%H1980><s%> Go כְּנ֨וֹס <S%H3664><s%> gather together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיְּהוּדִ֜ים <S%H3064><s%> all the Jews הַֽנִּמְצְאִ֣ים <S%H4672><s%> that are present בְּשׁוּשָׁ֗ן <S%H7800><s%> in Shushan וְצ֣וּמוּ <S%H6684><s%> and fast עָ֠לַי <S%H5921><s%> and וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֹּאכְל֨וּ <S%H398><s%> ye for me and neither eat וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁתּ֜וּ <S%H8354><s%> nor drink שְׁלֹ֤שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> three יָמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> days לַ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> night וָי֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> or day גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> and וְנַעֲרֹתַ֖י <S%H5291><s%> I also and my maidens אָצ֣וּם <S%H6684><s%> will fast כֵּ֑ן <S%H3651><s%> likewise and so וּבְכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> way אָב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> will I go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> in unto the king אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> according כַדָּ֔ת <S%H1881><s%> which [is] not according to the law וְכַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> and if אָבַ֖דְתִּי <S%H6><s%> and if I perish אָבָֽדְתִּי׃ <S%H6><s%> I perish

וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> went his way מָרְדֳּכָ֑י <S%H4782><s%> So Mordecai וַיַּ֕עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and did כְּכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוְּתָ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> had commanded עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> as אֶסְתֵּֽר׃ <S%H635><s%> according to all that Esther ס
